message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd really find it useful.  I'm asking $120 for it to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $110.  I believe this product is worth the value it would bring you.
I understand you're willing to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $100? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
